attributes.action: Review the medical information criteria for Disability Living Allowance.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Request a change of disability living allowance information Criteria from proffesional bodies MS changes a persons condition at a rate different to each sufferer but if a person re-applies for DLA a year on there is no further update requested from the GP they are using far outdated information to assess the claim. please can the creteria be reset that for MS suferers DLA must request new information if what they have is older than 6 months.
